meanings.sent1: The fetors from the garbage can made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The fetors of the rotten eggs filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The fetors in the old socks could wake up a sleeping bear!
meanings.sent4: The fetors of failure lingered in the air like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The fetors of the skunk sprayed everywhere, impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: The characteristic smell of decay or putrefaction.
meanings.sent1: The fetors of the decaying fruit were overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The fetors of the swamp indicated something was not right.
meanings.sent3: The fetors of the spoiled milk danced around the room like mischievous ghosts.
meanings.sent4: The fetors of corruption seeped into every corner of the city.
meanings.sent5: The fetors of the graveyard clung to the night, hauntingly familiar.
